MSG.EXAMPLE_ERR0001: This is example message. Include 2 parameters: %s and %s.
MSG.APP_ERR0001: There is a problem with the website. Please contact the site owner.

400.TITLE: BAD REQUEST
400.MSG:
Your browser sent a request that this server could not understand. 
Please contact the site owner.

403.TITLE: FORBIDDEN
403.MSG:
We are sorry. 
But you do not have access to this page.

404.TITLE: PAGE NOT FOUND
404.MSG:
We looked everywhere for this page. 
Are you sure the website URL is connect?.

500.TITLE: INTERNAL SERVER ERROR
500.MSG:
We are sorry. 
An internal server error has occured. Try to refresh this page again or contact the owner site.
